long_description: Designed to boost comfort during fast-paced activities in cool weather, the women's Summerset Jacket uses high-performance, breathable soft-shell fabric with a hood to keep you warm. Soft-shell fabric offers 4-way stretch, breathability and water repellency. Comes with an attached adjustable hood; rib-knit collar zips up to keep neck warm even when hood is down. Comfortable internal rib-knit cuffs seal in warmth. The women's Summerset Jacket features zippered handwarmer pockets with soft fabric to warm hands, plus an interior zippered pocket. Closeout.
short_description: Designed to boost comfort during fast-paced activities in cool weather, the women's Summerset Jacket uses high-performance, breathable soft-shell fabric with a hood to keep you warm.
